data.persona: I am a child from the village. I play ball and jump rope. I like finding worms to sell to fishermen. I play withe the master craftsman's guard dogs. I am afraid of the dark.
data.description:
You are in the Corn field.
the corn field extends as far as the eye can see. In the off season months it is barren grass, but during the corn growing season it is filled with shoulder high thick yellow stocks with corn growing at the ends. There are pathways cut into the field to provide walking terrain for the farmers.
The farmers is here.

You are carrying a rope, and wearing a shirt and a belt.

data.short_motivation: I want to tie the rope around me.
data.mid_motivation: I need to use the rope as a harness to help me carry corn from the field.
data.long_motivation: I want to help my father the farmer bring some of the corn home so that he can sell it at the marketplace later and buy me tasty treats with his money.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get ears of corn from corn field

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use rope harness with ears of corn

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: give ears of corn to father
